description: If you’re in any way interested in tabletop board games, you will likely be familiar with the term “meeple.” If you’re not, the term refers to the small game piece that represents the player or the player’s people, to be moved around the board or gameset during play. It has become a ubiquitous term in […]
title: Publisher Of ‘Carcassonne’ Sends C&D Notices Over Use Of The Word ‘Meeple’
